ygData.msgSnippet: I just wanted to find out more about the beastlord. ... From: Dr Scurrilous PhD  To:  Sent: Tuesday, July
ygData.messageBody:
I just wanted to find out more about the beastlord.

----- Original Message -----
From: Dr Scurrilous PhD <psychoinhell@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, July 30, 2002 12:48 PM
Subject: Re:[EverQuest] The Beastlord


> yeah
> I agree :)
> I say we move on...
>
> To my race is better then your race
> lets stir up some Norrath racism
> hmmmm
> I am home elf
> yep that is right
> I am inky
> I am from the hood
> Neriak
> Foreign Quarter
> east side
>
> Kill whitey
> (elves that is)
>
> :p
>
>
